overview: Marko Kaasila has long senior management experience in high tech. Before co-founding Bitbar, he headed up Solutions Business Unit at Hantro, a mobile video technology company, and served on management board, leading to $50m acquisition by On2 Technologies ltd in 2007. Before that he held various management and leadership roles at Microcell in Finland, China and Hungary. Microcell was bought by Flextronics in 2004. Prior to Microcell, he was a Product Manager at Terra-Mobile/iobox, a mobile internet portal aqcuired by Telefonica Group in 2000.
